name: Geckolot
description:
Made for Globale Game JAM 2022, Geckolot is a dynamic platformer game.

It is a two player platformer game which relies on the duality of attraction and repulsion. A shy gecko and an enthousiastic axolotl need to combine their powers to get out of a splendid cavern. While the first is able to project his friend away from him, the second can attract the other. Together, they will have to solve many riddles and avoid many dangers to succeed!

The creators:

Hugo 'Kohuro' Carbiener

Guillaume "Pancho" Caucheteux

Mathieu "Thimotay" Coutant

Tom "BowRaiders" Duval

Léo "ΛεοΛεΛιον" Gizard

Henri "Biscuit Prime" Nomico

Louise “Lousch” Schnee

Controls

Axolotl: 

  • Q = Left
  • D = Right
  • Z = Jump
  • Space = Use power

Gecko: 

  • ← = Left
  • → =  Right
  •  ↑   = Jump
  • Right Shift = Use power

Global:

  • R = reset screen
  • I = Skip level
